data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Trenčiansky, Slovakia to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Trenčiansky, Slovakia

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Trenčiansky, Slovakia. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 68 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Trenčiansky against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Over 7.42 percent of the people of Trenčiansky are far from Jesus.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Jew, Slovak-speaking people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Trenčiansky, Slovakia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 8,855 believers in Trenčiansky to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 596,745 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.section_summary:
the state of Trenčiansky, Slovakia has a population of 605,600.

We estimate Trenčiansky has 8,855 people who might know Jesus, 551,824 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 44,921 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Trenčiansky, Slovakia.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

location.name: Trenčiansky
location.cities_list: Trenčín, Prievidza, Považská Bystrica, Partizánske, Dubnica nad Váhom
